mapper.select: SELECT B.MOCKCODE, B.CLASSSERIESCODE, F.NAME, B.SUBJECT_CD, C.SUBJECT_NM SBJ_NM, B.REQ_USR_NUM, B.SUM_POINT, B.AVR_POINT, B.SDV, E.MOCK_AVR_POINT, E.MOCK_ADJ_AVR_POINT, E.MOCK_10_POINT, E.MOCK_3_POINT, E.MOCK_ADJ_10_POINT, E.MOCK_ADJ_3_POINT FROM TB_TMOCKREGISTRATION A, TB_TMOCK_SBJ_MST B, TB_SUBJECT_INFO C, TB_TMOCKSUBJECT D, TB_TMOCK_STAT_MST E, TB_CATEGORY_INFO F WHERE A.MOCKCODE = B.MOCKCODE AND B.SUBJECT_CD = C.SUBJECT_CD AND B.MOCKCODE = D.MOCKCODE AND B.SUBJECT_CD = D.SUBJECT_CD AND B.MOCKCODE = E.MOCKCODE(+) AND B.SUBJECT_CD = E.MOCK_SUBJECT_CD(+) AND B.CLASSSERIESCODE = E.MOCK_CLASSSERIESCODE(+) AND B.CLASSSERIESCODE = F.CODE AND A.MOCKCODE = #{MOCKCODE} ORDER BY F.ORDR, D.SUBJECTORDER
